data.Name: Fleetmac Wood
data.Description: Doors 9:00PM | Show 10:00PM | 18+ Event tickets purchased for shows in The Perplexiplex DO NOT include admission to the Meow Wolf exhibit. If you would like to experience the converged worlds during your visit, exhibit tickets can be purchased separately and are based on availability. Not a tribute, but a rave and AV show that reworks the classic-rock sound of the Mac into a spectrum of electronic genres. Remixes of the hits and plenty of deep-cuts ready for the chiffon-filled dance floor. This is a tunnel-visioned, all-night journey. If you don’t like Fleetwood Mac, Stand Back, Stand Back. Since 2012, DJS Roxanne Roll and Alex Oxley have been hosting their tunnel-visioned event and celebrating the extensive back catalogue of Fleetwood Mac. With a curated and created assortment of remixes and edits they’ve shared their passion with like-minded hedonists at some of the best festivals and clubs in the world. Glastonbury to Robot Heart (Burning Man), from fabric London to Kantine am de Berghain. Sounds like: https://bit.ly/fmwvol9 Feels like: https://bit.ly/fmwsolvid Instagram: http://bit.ly/fmwinsta

data.Name: Andrew Bird and Iron & Wine and Neko Case
data.Description:
ANDREW BIRD, IRON & WINE, and NEKO CASE at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on June 24, 2020 has been rescheduled to June 22nd 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.

Unfortunately this show will no longer include a joint set by Calexico and Iron & Wine. Instead, the rescheduled June 2022 date will be a three-band bill of Andrew Bird, Iron & Wine and Neko Case. Tickets already purchased will remain valid, however refunds can be requested due to the date + lineup changes. 


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce ANDREW BIRD, IRON & WINE, and NEKO CASE live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre in 2022

Download the Red Rocks App before your visit. From purchasing and managing your tickets, to park and venue maps, tips, weather alerts and special offers, the official Red Rocks app has everything you need for an unforgettable concert experience.

data.Name: Santana + Earth, Wind & Fire: Miraculous Supernatural Tour
Ty Segall and The Freedom Band
data.Description: Ty Segall has been playing music and producing records since 2005, producing over a dozen albums under his own name and multiple other headings, including Epsilons, The Traditional Fools, Fuzz, GØGGS and The CIA. His music has been heard in movies and he has composed several television theme songs as well as playing on most of the late night shows currently on the air. His most recent album, Deforming Lobes, was recorded on the Freedom's Goblin tour of North America, in support of one his most popular collections yet - all of his last four solo album have landed in the Billboard Top 200. Ty's also played tons of shows and festivals around the world, toured most of the continents and is down to do some more.

data.Name: Wardruna
data.Description: The Wardruna show scheduled for October 21, 2021 at the Paramount Theatre has been rescheduled to Tuesday, November 8, 2022. Please hold on to your tickets as they will be honored at the rescheduled show. If you are unable to attend the new date, refunds are available at the point of purchase beginning on Wednesday, June 23, 2021 at this time through Friday, July 23, 2021 at 10pm. Refunds will no longer be available after 10 pm on Friday, July 23, 2021. Please contact the point of purchase if you have any questions or to request a refund on your purchase. Thank you and we appreciate your patronage.

data.Name: Sibling Rivalry: The Tour Starring Bob & Monet
data.Description: Sibling Rivalry Tour Update: The one about your money! Our team has been working hard rescheduling the tour (yes, now for the 3rd time!) and we are excited to share that the new Sibling Rivalry dates will be announced in early 2022. While we know that this is exciting news for most, we fully understand that it's been a long time coming! Rather than continue to hold your money hostage, we will be issuing refunds to all current ticket holders. Make sure you are signed up for our Obsessed email list www.obsessedwith.co/contact and follow our social channels @obsessedintl to find out when we put the full Sibling Rivalry tour back on sale next year. Bob, Monét, and the entire team thank you for your patience and understanding. We can't wait to see you once we can FINALLY get the show on the road! If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to info@obsessedwith.co. Thank you!

data.Name: Matchbox Twenty
data.Description: The Event Organizer is requiring all attendees of this event to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 OR have received and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72-hours prior to entering the venue. In attending the event, you certify and attest that you and all individuals in your party attending the event will abide by the following regulations: By purchasing tickets for this event, I confirm that at the time of the event I will have been fully vaccinated (14 days past final vaccination dose), OR will have received and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72-hours of the event. Children under 12 years of age will not be required to provide proof of vaccination or a negative test but must wear a face mask at all times. Fans with a valid medical or religious note preventing vaccination will be required to receive and provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72 hours of the event. Mask wearing will be required for everyone age 2 and older.

data.Name: Mission Ballroom
data.Description:
The Mission Ballroom is not only a premiere concert facility, but also serves as a unique special event space for corporate meetings and other functions, award shows, galas, weddings, receptions, launch parties, trade shows, private events, and more.

The Mission Ballroom is a scalable, state-of-the art concert venue scheduled to open in summer 2019. The 60,000 square-foot ballroom anchors North Wynkoop, a new 14-acre mixed use project by Denver-developers Westfield Company, located at the north-end of the RiNo neighborhood.

data.Name: Convergence Station @ Meow Wolf
data.Description: Meow Wolf’s third permanent exhibition is now open in Denver, CO. Convergence Station is unforgettable, transformational, and not to be missed. Discover immersive psychedelic, mind-bending art and an underlying rich narrative as you take a journey of discovery into a surreal, science-fictional epic.

data.Name: Red Rocks Amphitheatre
data.Description: Red Rocks Amphitheatre is an open-air amphitheatre built into a rock structure in the western United States, near Morrison, Colorado, ten miles west of Denver.

data.Name: The Black Buzzard at Oskar Blues
